profile.title: Tus neeg siv cov ntaub ntawv
profile.mustLogin: Koj yuav tsum nkag mus ua ntej saib cov kev teeb tsa.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Qhia thawj tsab thiab qhov txhais lus
profile.filterExplicit: Lim tawm yam tsis tsim nyog
profile.enableReadReceipts: Qhib kev paub thaum tau nyeem
profile.allowExplicitContent: Tso cai rau yam tsis tsim nyog
profile.disappearingMessages: Qhib kev xa lus ploj tom qab
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Vaj huam sib luag txog thaum yuav raug tshem tawm (vijtsam)
profile.saveSuccess: Tseg kev teeb tsa tiav lawm!
profile.saveError: Yuav tsis tseg tau kev teeb tsa
profile.avatarSuccess: Daim duab tau tso ua tiav!
profile.avatarError: Muaj teeb meem thaum tso daim duab
profile.noPrivateKey: Tsis muaj tus yuam sij ntiag tug ntawm no ntaus ntawv kom xa tawm.
profile.setBackupPassword: Tso ib lo lus zais los tiv thaiv koj cov thaub qab:
profile.backupDownloaded: Cov thaub qab uas tau zais tau rub tawm lawm.
profile.exportFailed: Kev xa tus yuam sij tawm tsis tiav
profile.enterBackupPassword: Sau lo lus zais rau cov thaub qab no:
profile.importSuccess: Tus yuam sij ntiag tug tau muab coj los rau hauv ntaus ntawv no lawm.
profile.importFailed: Kev xa tus yuam sij los tsis tiav (lus zais tsis raug lossis ntaub ntawv puas).
profile.keysRotated: Tau tsim ib khub yuam sij tshiab thiab tso tawm tus yuam sij pej xeem.
profile.rotateFailed: Kev hloov yuam sij tsis tiav.
profile.exportKey: Xa tawm tus yuam sij ntiag tug
profile.importKey: Nqa los tus yuam sij thaub qab uas tau zais
profile.keyDisclaimer: Koj tus yuam sij ntiag tug tsis txhob tawm ntawm ntaus ntawv no. Tso ib daim ntawv thaub qab muaj lo lus zais kom rov muab siv tau rau lwm ntaus ntawv.
profile.appearanceSection: Kev zoo nkauj / kev teeb xim
profile.callTextForwardingTitle: Hu thiab/los yog xa lus mus ntxiv
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Xa cov kev hu thiab cov lus tuaj rau koj tus xov tooj lossis email uas tau txheeb xyuas. Cov kev hu / lus tawm tuaj yuav qhia tau koj tus lej Chatforia.
profile.enableTextForwarding: Qhib kev xa lus mus ntxiv
profile.forwardTextsToPhone: Xa cov lus mus rau xov tooj
profile.forwardTextsToEmail: Xa cov lus mus rau email
profile.destinationPhone: Tus xov tooj uas yuav tau txais (E.164)
profile.destinationPhoneForCalls: Tus xov tooj (E.164) rau kev hu
profile.aliasBridging: Kev hu mus ntxiv (hu txuas ntxiv)

chat.selectPrompt: Xaiv ib tsab lus lossis chav sib tham kom pib tham
